generated.css: #top-banner{width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;border-bottom:1px solid #fff}#top-banner #title{margin-top:auto;margin-bottom:auto;margin-left:16px}#top-banner #account-container{margin-right:8px}#main,#main #content-container{width:100%;height:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:row}#main #content-container{padding-top:8px}#main #content-container #nav-container{height:100%;flex:2;border-right:1px solid grey}#main #content-container #nav-container #nav-list{padding-right:16px}#main #content-container #nav-container #nav-list li{color:grey;cursor:pointer;text-align:right}#main #content-container #nav-container #nav-list li.selected{font-size:20px;color:#fff}#main #content-container #todolist-container{flex:5;height:100%;margin-top:16px;margin-left:4px;border-right:1px solid grey}#main #content-container #todolist-container .title{margin-left:12px}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist{margin-top:16px;width:100%}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo{width:auto;padding-top:4px;margin-left:16px;margin-right:16px;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;border-bottom:1px solid grey}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo #todo-content-container{display:flex;flex-direction:row;width:100%}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo #todo-content-container #date{font-size:14px;width:150px;text-align:right;color:grey;padding-top:4px;margin-right:12px}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo #todo-content-container #content{width:100%}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo #todo-content-container #content-edit-container{width:100%;flex-direction:row;color:#aeaeae}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo #todo-content-container #content-edit-container .icon{margin-right:8px}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo #todo-content-container #content-edit-container #content-edit{margin:0;padding:0;color:#aeaeae;font-style:italic;text-decoration:underline;border:none}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo #action-buttons{display:flex;flex-direction:row}#main #content-container #todolist-container #todolist .todo #action-buttons .text-button{color:grey}#main #content-container #todolist-container #add-todo-container{width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:row;margin-top:16px}#main #content-container #todolist-container #add-todo-container #date-select{border:none;padding:4px;margin:auto 0 auto 8px;width:200px;height:fit-content;background-color:#fff;color:#2e1a47}#main #content-container #todolist-container #add-todo-container .text-button{margin-left:4px;margin-right:8px;font-size:20px}#main #content-container #additional-container{flex:4;margin-top:16px;margin-left:16px}#main #introduce{margin-top:32px;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;display:none;flex-direction:column}#main #introduce *{align-self:center}#main #introduce #welcome-text{margin-bottom:16px}
